title: Another Super pixel font company?
content:
You all know that [www.truthindesign.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023428/http:/www.truthindesign.com/) and with partnership with fontsforflash.com started super pixel fonts for flash which gives a smooth look in flash. A similar method is used on this site   
 [http://www.pixietype.com/news.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011023428/http:/www.pixietype.com/news.html)   
   
But they called it Pixel Fx.   
Is this the same as super pixel fonts?
author: darryl

comments.content:
I think so. At least two other people are working on that stuff too. And one of them calls it "BMX" format... :-)
